title: Larva
summaries: The Larva is an object that summons the Queen Bee boss when destroyed with any tool, weapon, or projectile. It is found naturally placed inside each of the Underground Jungle's Bee Hives.

Larvae are created during world generation, and each world has a limited number of them. Once all Larvae in a world have been destroyed, Queen Bee can still be summoned via the Abeemination, a crafted item.
